channel.title: DarkLight Development
channel.description:
Hello guys this will be my DarkLight Post i plan to have the following things on the site below:
-HTML -PHP -CSS
This will have many great features! I will be looking for some more developers for a better development outcome. This maybe released on mopar in the future!!
The Following things below will be on the development/site
-Great Background Features -Better Html -Sliders/Banner sliders
My previous experiences Are developing for various sites like community's or Runescape Private Server websites

item.title: DarkLight Development
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Was hoping to see some sort of website-based game in progress.
Also,

-HTML
-PHP
-CSS

…you sort of need these for it to be a website in the first place.
Good luck nevertheless.

Read full topic

item.title: DarkLight Development
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Great, so you have the basic requirements of a HTML document down, care to show us any development at all? Site purpose? Previous experience? Literally anything would be good…

Read full topic
